page.description: The OBJECT.DELETE() method is used with an Xdialog text control. It cuts the currently selected text from the contents of the VariableName text variable.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim ptext as P dim ptext.text as C dim ptext.object as P dim ip as N if (a_dlg_button = "delete") then a_dlg_button = "" ip = ptext.object.get_cursor() ptext.object.delete() 'after clicking the 'cut' button focus is on the button. we want to return focus to the edit control ui_dlg_ctl_goto(dlg_title,"ptext") if (ip <=len(ptext.text)) then ptext.object.set_cursor(ip) else ptext.object.set_cursorptext.text? end if a_dlg_button = "" 'this causes the text box to scroll if the insertion point is not currently visible ptext.object.show_caret() end if
